CustomField.description: When checked the mobile payments app will confirm payment intents before sending details to Salesforce. When un-checked, payment intents will be confirmed by Salesforce. Payment intents confirmed by Salesforce will include a Customer and the payment method will be attached to the customer for future use, with SCA required.
